Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/bottom: unknown concept "BoxModel"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/bottom

Function FProperty bottom()
Description bottom defines bottom alignment. It sets the vertical anchor to 100% of the height of the current figure. bottom() is equivalent to vanchor(1.0).

Also see BoxModel and vanchor.
